articles.author: Shivani Naik
articles.title: How singing national anthem at every hurdle invigorated team India to win Badminton Asia Team Championship - The Indian Express
articles.description: India won their first-ever Badminton Asian team title, with the women having never crossed quarters before, and with three youngsters not even 21 years old, leading this charge.
articles.content: When the public rendition of the national anthem happened with the whole stadium at Shah Alam, Malaysia standing up for the women’s badminton team in blue, India’s 3-2 finals success over Thailand go… [+5870 chars]
